front.title: IETF ICANN Protocol Support Organization Appointments Procedures

abstract.t: This document specifies the process by which the IETF appoints its 2representatives to ICANN's Protocol Support Organization's ProtocolCouncil (PSO-PC). Additionally, the process for selecting candidatesfor the PSO's appointments to the ICANN Board of Directors isspecified. This process specification reflects 2 years of IETFexperience with ICANN, the PSO-PC and the PSO organization, sincetheir inception in 1999.
